## Key concepts and skills

Today you will start working with `R` and learn to do the following: 

- Start a workflow in RStudio using GitHub, i.e., pull from a repository, commit, and push 
- Work with Markdown and Quarto documents 
- Load and save datasets in most commonly formats  (`.RData`, `.rds`, `.csv`, `.tsv`, `.dta`)
- Use basic `R` syntax 

## Key functions and packages 

- Base R
  - `<-` "assign"
  - `|>` "pipe"
  - `+` "add"
  - `c()`
  - `install.packages()`
  - `library()`
  - `summary()`
  - `head()`
  - `tail()`
  - `print()`
  - `ncol()`
  - `nrow()`
  - `sum()`
